Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=2 µM), Mycosphaerella arachidicola (IC50=10 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Exerts antifungal activity. Has weak mitogenic activity against murine splenocytes. Displays antiproliferative activity on a human hepatoma cell line and mouse leukemia cell lines. Inhibits human immunodeficiency virus-1 (HIV-1) reverse transcriptase.

Literature.Title: Gymnin, a potent defensin-like antifungal peptide from the Yunnan bean (Gymnocladus chinensis Baill).
Literature.Author: Wong JH, Ng TB.
